mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Estate of Hugh Adams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a statement listing charges incurred by or on behalf of George. This includes transportation to Baltimore and subsequent passage to Liberia and seems to settle the balance of the account ($251.23). The document was submitted to Robert Hutcheson by W. McLain, Fin. Sec. A. C. S. (American Colonization Society).
The available file is a PDF made from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Invoice from W. McLain for George, April 1860
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Legacies
